package.name: YeahCommerce_Catalog_Sync_Extension
package.summary: Automatic synchronization of Magento product catalog with Yeah!Commerce service
package.description:
Yeah!Commerce: Mobile and Social storefront for your Online Store Expand your ecommerce to mobile and social sales with ease
This module allows you to synchronize your product catalog with your Yeah!Commerce account. Integration includes synchronization between your shop and your Yeah!Commerce apps:
- Categories - Category Images - Products - Products availability - Product Images - Product Info - Product Prices
Yeah!Commerce service provides shop owners ability to create and automatically handle mobile and social apps.
- Storefront goes mobile and social with one click - Simply install and start selling more - Works with Magento like a charm - Products in your CMS will automatically streamline to mobile and social storefront
With Yeah!Commerce you get apps on: - iPhone - iPad - Android Phone - Android Tablet - Facebook
You can find more info at http://yeahcommerce.com If you have any questions feel free to contact Yeah!Commerce support at mail@yeahcommerce.com
package.notes:
Version: 1.0.17 Stability: Stable Notes: This module allows you to synchronize your product catalog with your Yeah!Commerce account. Integration includes synchronization between your shop and your Yeah!Commerce apps:
- Categories - Category Images - Products - Products availability - Product Images - Product Info - Product Prices New in version 1.0.17: - Version Stability fixed to 'Stable'
